description: A small clearing in the middle of the forest. One tree stands directly in the middle of this clearing, but it is long dead.

options.name: tree trail
options.action-text: As you open the rusty door, a waft of foul stenching air hits you in the face. You carefully head down the steps, and into the tree

options.description: A large tree, which seems somewhat perculiar. As you look closer, you see that there's a small door etched into the wood.
